posts.title: 一、部署KVM
posts.text: 刻录CentOS-7-x86_64-Minimal-1611.iso安装centos.7.3，安装完成之后上传或者下载CentOS-7-x86_64-DVD-1611.iso到系统里面 [root@localhost ~]# mkdir /mnt/cdrom[root@localhost ~]# mount -o loop -t iso9660 /home/iso/CentOS-7-x86_64-DVD-1611.iso /mnt/cdrom/[root@localhost ~]# cd /etc/yum.repos.d/[root@localhost ~]# mkdir repos.bak && mv *.repo repos.bak/[root@localhost ~]# vi CentOS-Local.repo[localcdrom]name=CentOS-$releasever -Local CDROMbaseurl=file:///mnt/cdromgpgcheck=0enabled=1[root@localhost ~]# yum clean all[root@localhost ~]# yum groupinstall "virtualization-hypervisor" "virtualization-platform" "virtualization-tools" "virtualization-client" "X Window System" -y

posts.title: SoftEther-Install
posts.text: 一、安装编译环境 yum -y install gcc zlib-devel openssl-devel readline-devel ncurses-devel 二、下载软件包 wget http://www.softether-download.com/files/softether/v4.20-9608-rtm-2016.04.17-tree/Linux/SoftEther_VPN_Server/64bit_-_Intel_x64_or_AMD64/softether-vpnserver-v4.20-9608-rtm-2016.04.17-linux-x64-64bit.tar.gz 三、解压、编译、设置权限 tar xzvf vpnserver-5070-rtm-linux-x86.tar.gzmakechmod 600 *chmod 700 vpncmdchmod 700 vpnserver 四、移动到其他的目录 cd ..mv vpnserver/ /usr/local/ 五、编辑service 服务文件 vi /etc/init.d/vpnserver 123456789101112131415161718192021222324# chkconfig: 2345 99 01# description: SoftEther VPN ServerDAEMON=/usr/local/vpnserver/vpnserverLOCK=/var/lock/subsys/vpnservertest -x $DAEMON || exit 0case "$1" instart)$DAEMON starttouch $LOCK;;stop)$DAEMON stoprm $LOCK;;restart)$DAEMON stopsleep 3$DAEMON start;;*)echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart}"exit 1esacexit 0 六、设置自动启动 chmod 755 /etc/init.d/vpnserver/sbin/chkconfig –add vpnserver/etc/init.d/vpnserver start

posts.title: putty小技巧
posts.text: 安装putty完设置好windows系统环境变量之后可以打开CMD窗口直接执行以下命令. 通过telnet协议连接putty -telnet 1.1.1.1 通过ssh协议连接putty -ssh 1.1.1.109 -P 11021 -l root -pw 416bcbe8af2704b27d508977bc 通过载入一个putty已保存的session来连接putty -load "cacti" -pw 416bcbe8af2704b27d508977bc
